name: Effugium
description:
"Now I am become Death, the destroyer of worlds." - J. Robert Oppenheimer

Effugium is a first-person exploratory horror walking simulator with a heavy emphasis on atmosphere and immersion.

Key Features:
  • Navigate and search for a means for escape as you explore the cold and empty space facility.
  • Immerse yourselves in the atmospheric sounds and world of Effugium!
  • Uncover and piece together the mystery of the space facility.

Effugium was developed by Team Glasses, a team of two students from USC Games in collaboration with the Berklee College of Music.

Playtime is approximately 6-10 minutes.

It is recommended to use headphones and an external mouse for the best possible experience of Effugium!
